mapper.update: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS UUDB_POOLS ( id IDENTITY, name VARCHAR(64) NOT NULL, keyType VARCHAR(64) NOT NULL, valueType VARCHAR(64) NOT NULL, UNIQUE (name) );

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS UUDB_POOL_ENTRIES ( id IDENTITY, pool INTEGER, entry VARCHAR(64), poolKey VARCHAR(512) DEFAULT NULL, lastAccess DATETIME, freezeTime DATETIME DEFAULT NULL, UNIQUE (pool, entry), FOREIGN KEY (pool) REFERENCES UUDB_POOLS (id) ON DELETE CASCADE ); CREATE INDEX IF NOT EXISTS IDX_POOL ON UUDB_POOL_ENTRIES(pool, entry);
